translation.en: Calling all trains!
♪ All aboard, let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ It's mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
translation.zh: ‎各位请上车 我们上路了

translation.en: ♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪ ♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
translation.zh:
‎特快前进 转危为安
‎全力完成超级任务

translation.en: ♪ Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
[Flicker] Pirate Trains Ahoy!
Arr, mateys! In honour of our first beach day this spring,
translation.zh:
‎喂 伙伴们 为了纪念
‎我们今年春天的第一个海滩日

translation.en: I'll tell ye the story of the most famous train pirate
translation.zh: ‎我要给你们讲讲最著名的海盗火车

translation.en: to sail the seven seas… Trackbeard!
translation.zh: ‎航行七大洋的故事 轨道胡子！

translation.en: [gasping] Nice!
Trackbeard is my most favourite pirate ever!
translation.zh: ‎轨道胡子是我最喜欢的海盗！

translation.en: I made my hat just like his!
translation.zh: ‎我做了一顶和他一样的帽子

translation.en: I wanted to grow a beard like his too,
but it would take way too long.
Legend says that Trackbeard sailed to this very beach
translation.zh: ‎传说轨道胡子曾航行到这个海滩

translation.en: in search of buried treasure.
When he found it, he hid his loot in a secret cave lair,
translation.zh:
‎他发现后 就把宝藏
‎藏在一个秘密的山洞里

translation.en: somewhere right here in town!
A secret pirate cave lair filled with secret pirate cave lair treasure?!
translation.zh:
‎一个秘密的海盗洞穴
‎塞满了秘密海盗洞穴宝藏？

translation.en: So cool!
Some say that on foggy nights,
you can still see the ship sailing near Beach Station!
translation.zh: ‎你仍然可以看到船在沙滩站附近航行

translation.en: Dude! What's up with Tiny? What could possibly be so exciting?
translation.zh:
‎兄弟 泰尼怎么了？
‎有什么能这么令人兴奋呢？

translation.en: Uh, guys? -Look! -Whoa!
Amazing!
Tiny! Is that a real pirate ship?
translation.zh: ‎泰尼 那是真的海盗船吗？

translation.en: It looks super piratey to me! And super huge!
translation.zh: ‎我觉得很有海盗风范 而且超级大

translation.en: It can't stay here at the beach.
I'll call Max. He'll know what to do!
translation.zh: ‎我去呼叫麦克斯 他知道该怎么做

translation.en: It looks just like the one from the book!
It's Trackbeard's ship?!
Calling all trains!
Please report to the busy board for today's Mega Mission.
translation.zh:
‎请向工作台报告
‎领取今天的超级任务！

translation.en: C'mon, Dread Pirate Diesel!
It be mighty time! -Arr! -[train whistle blowing]
Today's Mega Mission goes to…
[Max] Freight Nate!
Freight Nate is never late!
[Max] You get to pick up a pirate ship from Beach Station
translation.zh: ‎你可以从沙滩站接上一艘海盗船

translation.en: and deliver it to Museum Station so everyone can see it!
translation.zh:
‎然后把它带到博物馆站
‎这样每个人就都可以看到它

translation.en: A pirate ship?! I can make that delivery fast, fast, fast-arr!
translation.zh:
‎一艘海盗船吗？我可以
‎运送得快点儿、快点儿、再快点儿

translation.en: Please, please, please can Diesel and I come with you?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 迪赛尔和我能跟你一起去吗？

translation.en: We love pirates! We even look like pirates!
translation.zh:
‎我们很爱海盗
‎我们看起来都很像海盗

translation.en: Sure! Ye shall be me trusty crew!
translation.zh: ‎好 你们将是我信赖的船员

translation.en: Alright, Pirate Express! It's time to…
translation.zh: ‎好了 海盗快车 是时候…

translation.en: -Clean up! -Tune up!
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
♪ It's time to clean up ♪
♪ It's time to tune up ♪
♪ It's time to hook up ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪ ♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
translation.zh: ‎用力擦洗 擦洗 用力擦洗

translation.en: ♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.zh: ‎是时候清洗了‎ ‎是时候调整了

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪
Check. Check. Checkity check-check.
translation.zh: ‎完成 完成 完成 完成 完成

translation.en: And… You are Liza-certified!
[Max] And now it's time to hook up, with your Super Extendo Car!
translation.zh: ‎现在是时候连接你的超级加长车了

translation.en: The only car big enough to carry a mighty pirate ship!
translation.zh:
‎唯一一辆大到
‎可以载一艘巨大海盗船的车

translation.en: And I'll ride along too! There's no way I'd miss this pirate adventure!
translation.zh:
‎我也一起去
‎我绝对不会错过这次海盗冒险

translation.en: Pirates, ho!
Now you're ready to…
-Make tracks! -Make tracks!
Chugga, chugga, zoom!
[Nate] Come on, mateys!
Aye aye, Captain!
Keep an eye out for any scallywags, crew!
Don't worry, I brought my trusty water balloon car!
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我带了我可靠的水球车

translation.en: In case of any high-seas pirate battles!
Yes, battles! Wait, battles?
Great thinking, Captain Flicker! About these battles…
translation.zh:
‎-好想法 弗里克船长
‎-关于这些战争…

translation.en: [Nate] Approaching Beach Station.
[Flicker] Isn't it the coolest?!
According to my calculations, that really is Trackbeard's ship!
translation.zh:
‎根据我的计算
‎那确实是轨道胡子的船

translation.en: Time to load this ship onto the Super Extendo Car!
translation.zh: ‎是时候把这艘船装到超长车上了

translation.en: -Thanks, Tiny! -[whale calling]
Phew! Pirate ship aboard and ready to go!
Best day ever!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪
♪ Sailing the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
translation.zh: ‎去往未知港口 去往我们海洋之家

translation.en: ♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪ Whoops!
[Nate] Is that a treasure map?
I'll get it! Mega Grabber Claw, activate!
translation.zh: ‎我来拿 启动超级抓握勾爪！

translation.en: Yes! I got the map!
Yeah!
-[gasping] -But… We lost the ship.
We gotta get that ship back!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪
♪ Chasing our ship we need ♪
♪ Where it goes, nobody knows ♪
translation.zh: ‎它去了哪里 谁也不知道

translation.en: ♪ But we'll definitely need More speed, arr! ♪
translation.zh: ‎但我们绝对需要更快的速度

translation.en: [Faye] Time to get back in your pen, piggies!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪ ♪ Chasing our ship we need ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是海盗‎ ‎我们需要追寻我们的船

translation.en: Huh? Now where'd those little oinkers go?
The Popstar Piggies pillaged our pirate ship!
translation.zh: ‎流行明星小猪抢劫了我们的海盗船

translation.en: [gasping] I'll fetch 'em!
The pirate piggie ship is about to run out of tracks up ahead!
translation.zh: ‎小猪海盗船就要跑出轨道了

translation.en: I'll just make a switch! No problemo.
translation.zh: ‎我们来换个轨道 没问题的

translation.en: Big problemo!
The track switch is stuck!
Captain Flick-Arr will save it!
translation.zh: ‎弗里克船长会拯救这一切的

translation.en: I can't believe it! I did it!
I mean, of course I did it.
[Nate] Approaching Museum Station!
We're supposed to deliver the ship to the museum, not crash into it!
translation.zh:
‎我们应该把船送到博物馆
‎而不是撞上去！

translation.en: Okay, piggies! Time to walk the plank!
translation.zh: ‎好了 小猪们 是时候跳出木板了

translation.en: Okay, I have no choice!
Mega Lasso, activate!
Phew! Gotcha!
Mega yo-ho-hose, activate!
Grab it with me, mate!
Mega Claw, activate!
Mega Stabilizer Legs, activate!
Pull! Strong, strong, stronger!
translation.zh: ‎拉！用力 用力 再用力

translation.en: Hoo-ee! That was a close call!
But now we gotta get you piggies back to the farm.
translation.zh:
‎但现在我们要
‎把你们这些小猪送回农场

translation.en: Well, the delivery didn't go exactly as planned.
But we did get the ship to Museum Station!
translation.zh: ‎但我们确实把船带到了博物馆站

translation.en: And we found Trackbeard's map!
translation.zh: ‎而且我们发现了轨道胡子的地图

translation.en: It even smells like pirate!
Hey! There's a message here! What's it say, what's it say?!
translation.zh:
‎-喂 这里有条信息！
‎-上面写着什么？

translation.en: It says… “If ye think ye be mighty brave, then take me ship back to me cave.”
translation.zh:
‎上面写着：“如果你认为自己很勇敢
‎就把我送回我的山洞去”

translation.en: [gasping] His treasure cave!
Check it out…
The map shows how to get there! X marks the spot!
translation.zh:
‎这张地图显示如何到达那里
‎X标记就是位置

translation.en: Let's call Max!
Hey, Nate. What's up?
The pirate ship has been delivered to Museum Station!
translation.zh: ‎海盗船已经被送到博物馆站

translation.en: But… we found a map that leads to Trackbeard's lair!
translation.zh:
‎但我们找到了一张地图
‎可以通往轨道胡子的洞穴！

translation.en: -Whoa, cool! -Whoa, cool!
Secret pirate cave lair, actually.
Yeah! But the cave is way out in the ocean,
and the map says we have to take the pirate ship back there.
translation.zh: ‎地图上说我们必须要把海盗船带回去

translation.en: His lair could have a lot more pirate things to put in the museum!
translation.zh:
‎他的洞穴可能有更多的海盗遗物
‎可以放进博物馆

translation.en: Okay, Mighty Express! New Mega Mission!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 特快小火车 新的超级任务

translation.en: Follow the map, and sail the pirate ship back to Trackbeard's cave!
translation.zh:
‎跟随地图 驾驶海盗船
‎回到轨道胡子的洞穴

translation.en: We get to sail the pirate ship?!
Best day ever!
Roger that! This pirate crew is ready for more adventure!
translation.zh:
‎收到 我们海盗已经准备好
‎启程去更多冒险

translation.en: Can Diesel and I ride on Trackbeard's ship?
translation.zh: ‎迪赛尔和我能坐上轨道胡子的船吗？

translation.en: Please, please, please, please?!
Okay! But be careful up there! And I'll take your water balloon car.
translation.zh:
‎-可以 但在上面要小心
‎-我会带上你的水球车

translation.en: ♪ A pirate crew are we ♪
♪ Sailing the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
translation.zh: ‎去往未知港口 去往我们海洋之家

translation.en: ♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪
Whoa! Is it just me, or is Gusty Gulch especially gusty today?
translation.zh:
‎是我的错觉
‎还是今天的阵风就是特别大？

translation.en: Oh no! The map!
Wait, what?! We lost the map?!
translation.zh: ‎等等 什么？我们弄丢了地图？

translation.en: Oh, good. Got it.
Uh, is it just me, or are we going faster than fast, fast, faster?
translation.zh:
‎是我的错觉 还是我们的速度
‎一直在快点儿、快点儿、再快点儿？

translation.en: Shiver me timbers!
The ship's… [struggling grunts] Shivering… and timbering!
Huh. I didn't know pirate ships could fly.
They don't!
Oh. In that case…
-Help! -[Diesel whimpering]
Hang on! Mega Grabber Claw… activate!
[Flicker] Help!
Almost… got it…
Oh no! Now we're in the water?!
What are we gonna do?! This is terrible!
translation.zh:
‎我们该怎么做？
‎太糟糕了 简直太糟了

translation.en: This is totally bad! This is…
translation.zh:
‎我们该怎么做？
‎太糟糕了 简直太糟了 ‎这简直…等等

translation.en: Wait…
Ships are supposed to be in the water. I knew that.
translation.zh: ‎船就应该在水里 我是知道的

translation.en: -We'll just steer it! -[barking]
Problem, big problem!
The good news: Flicker and Diesel are okay.
translation.zh: ‎好消息是弗里克和迪赛尔都没事

translation.en: That's good!
The bad news: They broke the ship's steering wheel!
translation.zh: ‎坏消息是他们把船舵弄坏了

translation.en: That's bad!
Pirate in danger! Pirate in danger!
translation.zh: ‎海盗有危险 海盗有危险！

translation.en: [Nico] More bad news: The ship's floating right toward super pointy rocks!
translation.zh:
‎更多坏消息
‎船正朝超尖的岩石漂去！

translation.en: Yep. That's more bad!
[gasping] I know how to steer the ship past those rocks!
translation.zh: ‎我知道怎么把船开过那些礁石

translation.en: [Nate] Ready, aim… balloon!
Ah! We're under attack, Diesel!
translation.zh: ‎我们遭受了攻击 迪赛尔！

translation.en: Oh! We're being saved!
I knew that too.
It's working, Nate! Keep tossing!
translation.zh: ‎起作用了 内特 继续扔

translation.en: Bam! Day and pirate ship saved!
Yeah! But… [Nico] Now it's headed out to sea.
Flicker, you're out of water balloon range!
translation.zh: ‎弗里克 你的水球射程不够了

translation.en: You'll need to steer the ship! [Nico] Can you fix the steering wheel?
translation.zh:
‎你需要驾驶这艘船
‎你能修好船舵吗？

translation.en: Oh, no! We're missing a part!
[gasping] That's it! My toy pirate sword!
translation.zh: ‎就是这个 我的玩具海盗剑！

translation.en: -[Flicker] Got it! -[barking]
Captain Flicker is ready to steer!
Oops, sorry! Heh heh.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 抱歉 ‎这是我第一次开海盗船

translation.en: It's my first time sailing a pirate ship.
And it's going pretty smoothly!
Diesel, fetch the map so we can find the pirate cave!
translation.zh:
‎迪赛尔 去拿地图
‎这样我们好找到海盗洞

translation.en: Captain Flick-Arr will be on the lookout
for any scallywags lurking in these waters.
[gasping] There it is! Trackbeard's secret cave lair!
translation.zh: ‎就在这里 轨道胡子的秘密洞穴

translation.en: Avast, matey! There be something lurking in the water!
translation.zh: ‎别动 朋友 水里潜伏着什么东西

translation.en: Be it a scallywag?
Ah! Scallywag! I mean, giant octopus!
[Nico] Excuse me, Mr. Giant Octopus.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 巨型章鱼先生

translation.en: Please put my friends down!
Ah, well. It was worth a shot.
Ah! Put me down!
Mission Station to Flicker,
it looks like you stopped. Is everything all right?
translation.zh:
‎-看起来你们停住了
‎-一切都好吗？

translation.en: No.
Things are very, very, very, very not all right!
[Nico] A giant octopus is holding onto us!
Whoa! We're on our way!
-[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains! We have an emergency!
translation.zh: ‎呼叫所有火车！我们有紧急情况了！

translation.en: [all] It's Mighty Time!
Nate! Where's Flicker?
[Flicker] Help!
We have to get out there and save them. But how are we gonna get across the water?
translation.zh:
‎-我们必须出去救他们
‎-但我们要怎么穿过水域呢？

translation.en: [Flicker] Guys! The map says…
"If tracks to me lair ye seek…" Ah! "Pull me switch…" Whoa! "…by yonder creek!"
translation.zh:
‎“如果你们找到我的藏身之处
‎就拉动我在小溪边的开关”

translation.en: Switch by yonder creek?
There must be a hidden switch around here somewhere!
translation.zh: ‎这附近肯定有个隐藏的开关

translation.en: I wish we knew what the switch looks like.
translation.zh: ‎我希望我们知道开关是什么样子的

translation.en: I think I found the switch.
Well, my big toe found it.
Whoa! Old pirate tracks!
Chugga, chugga, woo-hoo!
Okay, Mighty Express! Let's make tracks!
translation.zh: ‎好了 特快小火车 我们出发吧！

translation.en: My big bro! And all the Mighty trains!
translation.zh: ‎我的哥哥！还有所有特快小火车

translation.en: Attention giant octopus!
Put down our friends!
You are breaking 157 safety rules!
Ah! 158 rules!
Mighty Express, we need a Mighty Move. Super speed!
translation.zh:
‎特快小火车 我们需要超级移动
‎超级速度！

translation.en: Fast, fast, faster!
Well, it's a good thing pirate ships can fly!
[Flicker] We're heading toward Trackbeard's hidden treasure!
translation.zh: ‎我们正前往轨道胡子的宝藏

translation.en: Full speed ahead!
[Flicker] Ahoy, mateys!
There be the entrance to Trackbeard's cave!
Let's bring this ship in, mateys!
translation.zh: ‎我们把船开进去吧 朋友们

translation.en: Ah! I didn't touch anything!
Arr you seeing what I'm seeing?!
Ahoy, landlubbers!
Captain Flick-Arr and his mighty pirate crew present…
translation.zh: ‎弗里克船长和他的超级船员呈献…

translation.en: Trackbeard's treasure!
You know what? I say we leave the ship right here.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？我想说
‎我们就把船放在这里

translation.en: We can turn the whole cave into a pirate museum!
translation.zh:
‎我们可以把整个洞穴
‎变成一个海盗博物馆

translation.en: Thanks to the mighty pirate crew of Flicker, Nico, Nate, and Diesel!
translation.zh:
‎多谢超级海盗弗里克、尼可
‎内特和迪赛尔

translation.en: Done and delivered!
It was arr pleasure!
♪ A… ♪ ♪ Pirate crew are we ♪
♪ We sailed the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home, ♪
translation.zh: ‎去往未知港口 去往我们海洋之家

translation.en: ♪ Now it's pirate treasure we keep, arr! ♪
translation.zh: ‎这是我们要保存的海盗宝藏
